definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Liquid fluid system is the key part of in-site leaching.
sentences.chinese: 採場液流系統的研究是就地浸出的關鍵技術之一。

sentences.english: All vanadium redox flow battery(VRB) is a novel electrochemical apparatus which can transfer and store electricity effectively.
sentences.chinese: 全釩液流電池是一種新型高效電能轉化與儲存裝置。

sentences.english: The permeability of a soil is important for calculations of underground flow.
sentences.chinese: 土的滲透性對於地下液流的計算很爲重要。

sentences.english: The molten glass flows through orifices and temperature resistant bushings at the base of each furnace.
sentences.chinese: 熔融的玻璃液流過噴絲頭以及熔爐底部的耐高溫襯套。

sentences.english: The liquid flow system of a stope is a key for stope leaching.
sentences.chinese: 採場液流系統的研究是就地浸出的關鍵技術之一。

definition: to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
(chemistry) mass transfer (as observed in processes like evaporation, distillation and membrane filtration)
